覌字的基本解释

覌
guān
均同“观”。

覌
guàn
均同“观”。

覌字的汉语字典释义

[①]［guān］
［《廣韻》古丸切，平桓，見。］
“观1”的繁体字。“覌1”的繁体字。亦作“観1”。
(1)观看；观览。
(2)观察；察看。
(3)示范；显示。
(4)引申为示意。
(5)游览。
(6)玩赏。
(7)多。
(8)鉴戒；借鉴。
(9)引申为效法。
(10)容饰；形态。
(11)景象。
(12)对事物的认识或看法。
(13)通“勸”。
(14)通“涫”。沸滚。
(15)占卜。
(16)卦名。六十四卦之一，坤下巽上。
[②]［guàn］
［《廣韻》古玩切，去换，見。］
“观2”的繁体字。“覌2”的繁体字。亦作“観2”。
(1)古代宫门外的双阙。
(2)楼台。
(3)京观。
(4)道教的庙宇。
(5)古国名。
(6)姓。春秋楚有观射父。见《国语·楚语下》。

覌字的康熙字典解释
覌字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
覌字的起名意思

暂无。

Yin
Basic explanation of words
Yin
guān
All the same "view".
Yin
guàn
All the same "view".
Yin
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［guān］
["Guangyun" Guwan cut, Pinghuan, see you. ]
Traditional characters of "观1". Traditional characters for "覌1". Also known as "観1".
(1) Watching; viewing.
(2) Observe; observe.
(3) Demonstration; display.
(4) The extension is indicative.
(5) Tour.
(6) Play and appreciate.
(7) More.
(8) Enlightenment; reference.
(9) The extension is to imitate.
(10) Appearance; form.
(11) Scenery.
(12) Knowledge or perception of things.
(13) Through "persuade".
(14) Through "涫". Boiling.
(15) Divination.
(16) The hexagram name. One of the sixty-four hexagrams, Kun is down and Sunda is up.
[②]［guàn］
["Guangyun" antiques cut, change it, see you. ]
Traditional characters for "观2". Traditional characters for "覌2". Also known as "観2".
(1) Shuangque outside the ancient palace gate.
(2) Terraces.
(3) Jingguan.
(4) Taoist temples.
(5) Ancient country name.
(6) Last name. In the Spring and Autumn Period, Chu Youguan shoots his father. See "Mandarin · Chu Yuxia".
Yin

Source glyph
Font comparison: Song Ti, Mainland China

Name meaning
